Subject: JKIA police seize ivory worth Sh6.4 million on transit from Mozambique to Thailand
Method of Concealment - Details:
According to police the ivory was concealed in a luggage that had been disguised as gemstones. 

Airport head of DCI Joseph Ngisa said there were 22 stones in the cargo but two of them had ivory. “The rest were just stones disguised as gemstones. There were no gemstones,” said Ngisa.
